Description: Lamp; earthenware; of coarse, gritty, red fabric with a loop handle, a central filling-hole with high neck and flaring rim; missing the spout and wick-hole.
Curator's comments: Wadi Sarga provenance based on association with other material and consistency of ware and form.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2277bis MLA)
